name: builder_gerund_punct
title: Data Engineer
jd_text: You will be extended autonomy, designing, expanding, and optimising our data and data pipeline architecture to support new predictive models.

name: fixer_migration_noun
title: Senior Data Engineer
jd_text: Support the migration, integration, and transformation of SAP S/4HANA data into a modern cloud analytics platform. Guide data migration from legacy systems to target state architectures.

name: operator_runbooks_resilience
title: Cloud Platform Engineer
jd_text: Strengthen platform reliability and operational resilience. Produce clear operational documentation and runbooks. Handle incident response and production support.

name: translator_self_serve_semantic
title: Analytics Engineer
jd_text: Enable self-serve analytics for business users by creating semantic models and translating stakeholder requirements into reporting solutions.

name: fixer_redesign_platform
title: Data Engineering Manager
jd_text: You will join an established Snowflake platform that will be assessed and subsequently redesigned for future use as part of a transformation program.
